name: SusGain
description: susGain is an award-winning, B-corp certified, social enterprise on a mission to better connect the different eco and socially conscious stakeholders to accelerate the change towards more sustainable communities. susGain's gamified engagement app focuses on driving long-term behavioural change within communities (corporates, schools, NGOs etc.) whilst measuring the impact created. Our region-wide services include Employee Engagement Programmes, Events & Experience Design and Community Programmes with customized activities and challenges designed to engage your community in a fun and rewarding way.
